item.title: Correcting Common Word Games
item.description: Correcting Common Word Games The political landscape today is presented as an ever-changing battlefield between opposing factions, or “identity groups”. What is needed is not more opposing groups, but a differentiation of ideals. Sign Posts These are some of the thinking-errors that we intend to correct over the coming months as we develop this site: postmodernism is anti modernism Democratization is actually liberalization Democratization –> Liberalization
